resources.string: Happy fish on the start screen

Soda cans are many and they 
destroy the environment, due to 
their material structure consisting 
of mostly aluminum. If hit by 
soda can player will lose 1 life 
point. If avoided gain 10 points.

Toxic waste is not as frequent or 
fast as soda cans, but makes up 
for it with their size and damage 
output. If hit by toxic waste player 
will lose 2 life points. If avoided 
gain 25 points.
Pick a heart up to gain a life back. \nIf already full health, then gain \n40 points. (maximum lives is 3)
